item.title: China’s Biotech Is Cheaper and Faster Than America’s
item.description: China’s biotechnology sector has established a bright future by focusing not on breakthrough cures and treatments but on speed and efficiency.

item.title: Generation X Needs to Stop Complaining
item.description: It’s fine to make room for the next generation.

item.title: At Trump and Putin Summit, an Alaskan Halibut Dish Gets a Cameo
item.description: Halibut Olympia, a Tuesday-night kind of recipe, was part of the planning (if not the eating) at the Friday meeting.

item.title: Putin Sees Ukraine Through a Lens of Grievance Over Lost Glory
item.description: Speaking after Friday’s summit, President Putin again implied that the war is all about Russia’s diminished status since the fall of the Soviet Union.

item.title: Jeanine Pirro Takes on Prosecutor Role in Trump’s D.C. Crackdown
item.description: As the U.S. attorney in Washington, Jeanine Pirro is a central player in a clash that could define her legacy: the president’s takeover of local law e...
